headline: Water And Freezing Damage, Burglary Lead The Hartford’s Top Five Small-Business Claims
summary: HARTFORD, Conn., December 09, 2025--Damage from water leaks and frozen pipes are among the most common insurance claims for small-business owners, while claims involving fire are the most expensive, according to an analysis of The Hartford’s small-business claims from 2020 to 2024.

headline: Q3 Earnings Outperformers: Hartford (NYSE:HIG) And The Rest Of The Insurance Stocks
summary: The end of an earnings season can be a great time to discover new stocks and assess how companies are handling the current business environment. Let’s take a look at how Hartford (NYSE:HIG) and the rest of the insurance stocks fared in Q3.
